video.title: Summer in the City -- A Cappella
video.description:
"Summer in the City" by The Lovin' Spoonful

Recorded July 7, 2007 for the "A Cappella Karaoke" Project at www.zefrank.org

comment.text: Your range is AWESOME! I wish I could sing a bass line.... And this video raises the bar... multiple locations, lighting arangements.... man oh man. Nice work!

Boys get to use the falsetto and cheat! :)

Thank you though. I'm jealous of the pitch perfect lushness on yours. I wish I'd had some vocal training.
